src.clf.svm_training module¶

Description:

Training a Linear Support Vector Machine classification model for predicting probabilities of medical specialties

Usage:

$ python src/clf/svm_training.py

Possible arguments:

  • -g or –gridsearch: run gridsearch

src.clf.svm_training.build_pipeline(pipeline: Pipeline) → Pipeline¶

Build pipeline for model :param preprocessing_pipeline: pipeline with preprocessing steps :type preprocessing_pipeline: Pipeline

Returns:

pipeline for model

Return type:

Pipeline

src.clf.svm_training.custom_accuracy_function(model: Pipeline, X_train: Series, y_train: Series) → float¶

Custom scorer with accuracy @3 :param model: pipeline for model :type model: Pipeline :param X_test: test data :type X_test: pd.Series :param y_test: test labels :type y_test: pd.Series

Returns:

accuracy @3

Return type:

float

src.clf.svm_training.grid_search(X_train: Series, y_train: Series, model_pipeline: Pipeline, param_grid: list[dict[str, object]]) → Pipeline¶

Grid search for best model :param X_train: train data :type X_train: pd.Series :param y_train: train labels :type y_train: pd.Series :param model_pipeline: pipeline for model :type model_pipeline: Pipeline :param param_grid: list of parameters for grid search :type param_grid: list[dict[str, list[float]]]

Returns:

best model

Return type:

Pipeline
